#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long int

int main()
{
  ll t,n,dif,i;
  scanf("%lld",&t);

  while(t--)
  {
    scanf("%lld",&n);
    ll a[n];
    //flag=0;
    dif=0;

    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    scanf("%lld",&a[i]);

    sort(a,a+n);

    /*for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
    printf("%lld ",a[i]);*/



      //printf("%lld\n",dif);

     dif=a[n-1]-a[0];

     //printf("%lld\n",dif);


    //printf("\n");
    if(dif>=2)
    printf("BAD\n");
    else
    printf("GOOD\n");


  }

 return 0;
}
